ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: truly it is the speech of a noble Messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That this is indeed the word of an honoured Messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily this is the word of a noble message-bearer;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: that the Quran is the word of the honorable angelic, mighty Messenger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is indeed the recitation of an honoured Noble Messenger. (Angel Jibreel – peace and blessings be upon him.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, this is the Word a most honorable messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely it is the Word of an honored messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: truly this is the word of a noble Messenger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That this is in truth the word of an honoured messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Truly, this is the word brought by a noble messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily it is a Word brought by a messenger honoured,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: it is indeed the speech of a noble apostle,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily this is the word of a most honourable Messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, this is the Word (this Quran brought by) a most honourable messenger [Jibrael (Gabriel), from Allah to the Prophet Muhammad (Peace be upon him)].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: it is indeed the word of an Honorable Messenger,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is the speech of a noble messenger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [81:19] truly this, Qur’ān, is the word of a messenger [who is] noble, in the sight of God, exalted be He — this being [the messenger] Gabriel (it [qawl, ‘word’] has been annexed to him, because he descends with it),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That this) i.e. the Qur'an (is in truth the word of an honoured messenger) Allah says: it is brought down by Gabriel to a messenger who is honoured by Allah, i.e. Muhammad (pbuh)
